CAREER SUMMARY
Mar 2021 to date Carnaud Metalbox Engineering Ltd
Position: Sr. Key Account Manager EMEA – Lactic Acid & Specialties
Assembly of machinery and equipment with the use of engineering drawings, machine build books and SOP’s, producing quality work to the required standard in a safe manner following CMB procedures.
Jan 2021 to Mar 2021 Sovereign Air Mouvement Ltd
Position: Mechanical Fitter
Manufacturing of air handling units, following Engineering drawings and instructions. Design of insulation system, assembly and prepare panels to be fitted in the units. Execute bending, rolling, cutting, drilling, punching, and welding operations. Fabrication of metal structural parts such as plates, bulkheads, and frames. Mark lines and holes in dimensions, ready for fitting of fans, coils, and positioning of transfer system.
Feb 2020 to Oct 2020
Position: Mechanical Fitter
Read, follow basic schematic, Engineering drawings, and other written instructions or procedures to accurately assemble of units, building of refrigerant system by catting, fitting, and brazing ;(including copper and silver).
April 2015 to Sept 2017 Regideso S.A.
Position: Water Distribution System Technician
Perform skilled work in installation, maintaining, and repair of water distribution system.
Achievement Design of projects involving provision of potable water, disposal of wastewater and sewage, or prevention of flood-related damage.
Repair and maintenance of water mains, valves, and other services, including excavating and back filling services accesses; Cutting, assembling, and installing pipes and tubes with attention to existing infrastructure (e.g. electrical wiring).
COMMENT
A reliable person with experience in Manufacturing, water treatment plant, process and distribution operation, pipe fitting, Mechanic maintenance, assembly, Design and Construction. Strong work ethic in term of health and safety and great attention to detail. Enjoys working both individually and in team.
Technical Skills
Solid works
CAD
MATLAB
Word, Access, Excel, PowerPoint
Windows Operating Systems
Mechanical maintenance
Mechanical fitting
Sheet metal building
Welding & brazing CAT2
For further information please contact Julie Smith or Jan Johnston on 01695 570 696 or email julie.smith@johnston-vere.co.uk
